sources.title: "The Trail of the North Wind" (1924) starring Nell Shipman
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation   "The Trail of the North Wind" is a short drama about the Northern frontier. We have included this film in our program to illustrate the work and contributions of Nell Shipman, a star of Silent Hall of Fame.   Directed by                 Nell Shipman and Bert Van Tuyle Produced by               Nell Shipman Productions Inc. Written by                  Nell Shipman Starring                      Nell Shipman, Daddy Duffill, Barry Shipman, Tex the Malamute dog Cinematography        Robert S. Newhard Release date                August 1, 1924 Running time              22 minutes Country                        US Language                     Silent film     Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976: "Allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use."

metadata.Actors: Nell Shipman, Daddy Duffill, Barry Shipman
